revised_title: Vernon Herbert Blackman: A Pioneering Botanist and Plant Physiologist
tldr: Vernon Herbert Blackman was a prominent botanist and plant physiologist who made significant contributions to the fields of plant sexuality, plant physiology, and agriculture. His academic career spanned a time when botany became an experimental subject, and he played a crucial role in advancing the understanding of plant processes and cytology. Blackman's work in plant sexuality and plant physiology had a lasting impact on the scientific community, and he remained active in botany until his advanced age.
